FilterItemPortable.Name: Cadastrada
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>1</Value> <Text>Cadastrada</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>BooleanFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Confirmar
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">( (A.LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO = 'S' OR A.LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO IS NULL) AND (A.STATUS IN(1)) AND ( (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IS NULL AND A.CONFIRMANTE = @USUARIO) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IS NULL AND A.CONFIRMANTE = @USUARIO) ) ) AND ( (A.USUARIOINCLUIU = @USUARIO) OR ( (SELECT FILTRAUSUARIOOVINCLUIU FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE= @USUARIO) = 'N'))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>( (A.LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO = 'S' OR A.LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO IS NULL) AND (A.STATUS IN(1)) AND ( (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IS NULL AND A.CONFIRMANTE = @USUARIO) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I, CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPOASSINATURAS IS NULL AND A.CONFIRMANTE = @USUARIO) ) ) AND ( (A.USUARIOINCLUIU = @USUARIO) OR ( (SELECT FILTRAUSUARIOOVINCLUIU FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE= @USUARIO) = 'N'))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Liberada
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ListItem"> <Value>1</Value> <Text>Cadastrada</Text> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="LIBERADOCONFIRMACAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>BooleanFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Todos
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.STATUS > 0</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>true</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="NUMEROOV"> <FieldDefinitionName>IntegerFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="3" FieldName="DATADABASE"> <FieldDefinitionName>DateTimeFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="4" FieldName="PESSOA"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties /> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="5" FieldName="AGENTEVENDAS"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties /> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
